column1: @realDonaldTrump your ignorance and response towards #COVID19 is what is fueling the stock market losses. Not to mention supply chain disruptions and lack of productivity affecting economic growth. #TrumpVirus #FollowTheScience #WhereAreTheProfessionals
Haha! Projecting again? You, are the joke that everyone is laughing at. Your ignorance toward the crises is almost unbelievable! #TrumpVirus #COVID19 #FollowTheScience
